Off to Berlin

29 December 2006

We're off to Berlin to celebrate New Years and to finish off the Christmas Holidays.

Hopefully, it'll be as great as it was when I was there for the World Cup - just colder, and with less football on the telly, obviously.

Yikes it's early. Off to stand in a queue at the airport :) Happy New Year!

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
